item.title: By: adedeji92

item.description: Hi, Nice article , c an we have a way to add music controller(Like next, previous and play/pause) in the notification bar. any help? Attached image is an example https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/3c7e63b8f43fa29d70b0e455dabc1215f9327d5c88c92b8c2c5e762eac1f047c.png

item.title: By: elyptik
item.dc:creator: elyptik
item.description:
Hello ! First thank you for your tutorial it's still working at the moment ! I have a question, can we add more than one music in the player ? I will explain, I want that user put a lot of music and chose which one play. I tried something but it doesn't work. Can u give me some tips please Thx !!!
@arvindr21
item.content:encoded:
Hello !
First thank you for your tutorial it’s still working at the moment !
I have a question, can we add more than one music in the player ?
I will explain, I want that user put a lot of music and chose which one play. I tried something but it doesn’t work. Can u give me some tips please Thx !!!

@arvindr21

item.content:encoded:
great:)thanks a lot for your article
It work correctly on android 5 but in my android 4.1 it doesn’t work so i think cordova not work on less version .am i right ?

item.title: By: Sao Thien Hat
item.dc:creator: Sao Thien Hat
item.description:
Hi Arvind,
Thank you for your tutorial :). I wonder that is it possible to display image during playing an audio on full screen mode ? I try put image for bgImage with image in project such as: bgImage: "img/myImage.jpg" but it seem not work. Only bgColor working. Do I need have any special configuration to do that ?
item.content:encoded:
Hi Arvind,

Thank you for your tutorial :). I wonder that is it possible to display image during playing an audio on full screen mode ? I try put image for bgImage with image in project such as: bgImage: “img/myImage.jpg” but it seem not work. Only bgColor working.
Do I need have any special configuration to do that ?

item.content:encoded: hi i can play audo files in it but not video files please help

item.title: By: Vinicius Coimbra
item.dc:creator: Vinicius Coimbra
item.description:
Hi Arvind,
I don't know what i'm doing wrong. I cloned your project in github, installed all dependencies for the project, put the "" in config.xml to works in my Moto G2, but always when i try to play some music in my device, it doesn't work. My player never load and there is no callback to see log or errors :/
item.content:encoded:
Hi Arvind,

I don’t know what i’m doing wrong. I cloned your project in github, installed all dependencies for the project, put the “” in config.xml to works in my Moto G2, but always when i try to play some music in my device, it doesn’t work. My player never load and there is no callback to see log or errors :/

item.title: By: Abraham
item.dc:creator: Abraham
item.description:
Hi! thanks for your blog and this post, very useful. But i have a problem which is going me crazy. I've made a project with your code but "getDuration()" call return me -1 every time, so the progress bar doesn't work. My environment is: cordova version: 5.4.1 cordova platform android version: 5.1.0 cordova plugin media version: 2.1.0
anyone have any idea about what is happening? where is the problem? thanks in advance!
item.content:encoded:
Hi! thanks for your blog and this post, very useful.
But i have a problem which is going me crazy.
I’ve made a project with your code but “getDuration()” call return me -1 every time, so the progress bar doesn’t work.
My environment is:
cordova version: 5.4.1
cordova platform android version: 5.1.0
cordova plugin media version: 2.1.0

anyone have any idea about what is happening? where is the problem?
thanks in advance!

item.content:encoded:
video files is not playing…….whops we can not play this file..
why?
And mine question is also: how we can access mobiles video players for opening a video file which is hosted in my website..
please help

item.title: By: Arvind Ravulavaru
item.dc:creator: Arvind Ravulavaru
item.description: Try adding the Cordova media plugin : cordova plugin add org.apache.cordova.media
item.content:encoded: Try adding the Cordova media plugin : cordova plugin add org.apache.cordova.media
